message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that.  Could you do $105?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered my budget and am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.
